book.title: Crit Hit & Run
invariants: No convenient amnesia as a continuity device.

chapters.title: Welcome to the RNG-Hellscape
chapters.goal: Introduce Artie and his broken 'Crit-Only' status in a high-stakes environment.
chapters.stakes_shift: Artie shifts from a mundane office drone to a level 1 glitch in a lethal game world.

bridge.to_next: Artie must find a way to survive his first night with zero defensive stats.

chapters.title: The Glass Cannon's Guide to Not Dying
chapters.goal: Artie needs gear that doesn't rely on him being hit, as he can't take a single blow.
chapters.stakes_shift: Survival shifts from pure luck to tactical exploitation of the System's bugs.

bridge.from_prev: Artie is a marked man in Oakhaven.
bridge.to_next: Artie heads to the Low-Level Crypts to farm 'Evasion' gear.

chapters.title: Math-Boss vs. The Glitch
chapters.goal: Survive the Floor Guardian and secure the first major loot drop.
chapters.stakes_shift: Artie moves from a lucky survivor to a recognized 'Anomaly' with significant power potential.

bridge.from_prev: The Bone Golem is ready to smash Artie.
bridge.to_next: Artie leaves the crypts with a legendary-tier item that he can't actually use yet.

chapters.title: The Capital of Crits
chapters.goal: Artie must hide in plain sight while trying to find a way to stabilize his build.
chapters.stakes_shift: The stakes move from physical survival to social navigation and avoiding the 'System Police'.

bridge.from_prev: Artie is a fugitive from Vane's ego.
bridge.to_next: Artie enters the Grand Arena for a 'Low-Stakes' tournament.

chapters.title: The Tournament of Tiers
chapters.goal: Artie must fight through the brackets without taking a single point of damage.
chapters.stakes_shift: Public exposure turns Artie from a hidden glitch into a populist hero and a high-priority System threat.

bridge.from_prev: Artie is the underdog in the arena.
bridge.to_next: Artie reaches the finals against Vane.

chapters.title: The Final Roll
chapters.goal: Defeat Vane and survive the System's attempt to delete Artie.
chapters.stakes_shift: The conflict escalates from a personal duel to a reality-breaking crash of the entire game world.

bridge.from_prev: Artie enters the ring for the final match.
bridge.to_next: The System crashes, and Artie is left in the wreckage.

chapters.title: Rebooting for the Sequel
chapters.goal: Set up the long-term quest to fix (or further break) the world.
chapters.stakes_shift: Artie transitions from a player trying to survive to a virus-entity leading a resistance against the System.

bridge.to_next: Artie begins the quest for the Source Code in Book 2.
